title: Chambermaster Membership Management Software | GrowthZone
content:
Chamber of commerce professionals require a powerful, easy-to-use system to manage the daily workflow of running their organizations. GrowthZone Chamber Edition membership management software helps organizations grow and retain membership, engage and inform members and prospects, and streamline tedious tasks so they can focus their mission.

“Member management is even easier because the membership directory is enhanced with business categories. Also, “Hot Deals” are more accessible on the website, and there are expanded member profiles and opportunities for our corporate partners to list multiple locations.”

COREY ALLEN
GREATER HOUSTON LGBT CHAMBER OF COMMERCE

See more case studies »

More Members & More Engagement with GrowthZone Chamber Edition

In addition to guided onboarding and multiple options for product support and training, chambers of commerce love these functions:

MEMBER MANAGEMENT

Create multiple membership types, fee items—both recurring or one time—for each membership, and manage memberships right from the contact profile.
Learn more »

FORM BUILDER

Create surveys and collect data from landing pages and your website; results will auto-populate within your GrowthZone AMS to make data actionable.

CONTACTS

Easily view and manage all of the members, individuals, and organizations in your database, including billing information, communications, and more.

PROJECT MANAGEMENT

Manage all projects from one location and track them according to individual, organization, membership, and event.

Lists/Committees

Conveniently group your contacts into lists or committees for mass emails.

Fundraising/Donations

Manage fundraising campaigns for both pledge-based and non-pledge donations; provide reporting and financial tracking to your staff and board.

STAFF APP

Scan business cards to load contact data, view notes, register and check-in event attendees, and process event payments – all from your mobile device.
Learn more »

MEMBER APP

The MemberPlus App is a robust mobile communication & collaboration tool for your members.
Learn more »

WEB CONTENT MANAGEMENT

Web Content (Including Hot Deals, Job Postings, and News Releases)

Grow your community and add value with web content that integrates data from your GrowthZone AMS with your website.
Learn more »

INFO HUB/MEMBER CENTER

Give your members easy access to resources and benefits via the InfoHub, an online password-protected community.
Learn more »

ADVERTISING

Generate non-dues revenue for your organization and provide additional exposure to your members by offering advertising opportunities.

ONLINE STORE

Sell merchandise on your website and manage the process with your GrowthZone AMS.

BILLING

W/ GROWTHZONE PAY & CREDIT CARD PROCESSING

Process one-time and recurring payments with integrated payments and credit card processing. Learn more »

Watch Video

COMMUNICATION

Efficiently write, schedule, send, and track emails.

EVENT MANAGEMENT

Manage every aspect of your event, including registrants, exhibitors, and vendors. Includes Zoom and GoToWebinar integration for online meetings.
Learn more »

MARKETING AUTOMATION

Premium Module

Build great-looking email campaigns that ensure each prospect or member receives vital information, at the right time intervals.
Learn more »

SALES FUNNEL

Premium Module

Monetize and track sales opportunities such as memberships, sponsorships, and subscriptions; track by progress, probability, sales stage, and lead source.
Learn more »

excerpt: Chambermaster Software by GrowthZone is easy to use and streamlines daily operations. Schedule a demo now!
